previewArticle.title: Montreal Impact vs. Sporting Kansas City | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Montreal Impact 1, Sporting Kansas City 2 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Montréal Impact return home looking to score their first goal of the season in three tries vs. Sporting Kansas City when the Eastern Conference foes face off Saturday evening at Stade Saputo.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Montreal Impact vs. Sporting Kansas City | July 12, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: J'espère que votre tivi est pas trop vieille: c'est les bleus foncés contre les bleus pâles ce soir. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Ambiance Brésilienne
timelineItems.text: Elle est bien sympa la composition mais qui est en charge de récupérer les ballons au milieu ?? #IMFC #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: SKC Gameday
timelineItems.text: Montreal is 0-7-1 when allowing the first goal this season. #SportingKC is 7-0-4 when scoring first. 0-1 #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: Impact aimlessly punt the ball away into Kansas City's half. Impact fans clap in approval. That's how dire .. #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two of MLS' hottest young goalscorers go toe-to-toe at 7:30pm ET: http://t.co/ijygnpwtrZ #MTLvSKC http://t.co/SOii1xnus7

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Two of MLS' hottest young goalscorers go toe-to-toe at 7:30pm ET: http://t.co/ijygnpwtrZ #MTLvSKC http://t.co/SOii1xnus7

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 7-0 - @SportingKC outscored Montreal 7-0 in their first two meetings in @MLS 2014. @Ddwyer14 scored 4 of the last 5 goals. Rout. #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).
Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 1 - The Impact have beaten SKC just once out of four #MLS games in Montreal (1D 2L). Tense. #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Déjà une bannière dans la section des Ultras: «Liberté aux Ultras». #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Bruno Diaz
timelineItems.text: Prêts pour le match! Allez Montréal! #Imfc #imfclive http://t.co/z1pEtkFWJE

timelineItems.name: Bruno Diaz
timelineItems.text: Prêts pour le match! Allez Montréal! #Imfc #imfclive http://t.co/z1pEtkFWJE

timelineItems.name: Dave Moore
timelineItems.text: “@deannemoore: #Royals not on TV tonight? No problem, #SKC with the save.” Atta girl

timelineItems.name: Matteo Maldini
timelineItems.text: Part of me wants #IMFC to take it easy in league play and go full force for Concacaf CL instead. Hard to do well in both history has shown..

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Patterson
timelineItems.text: As expected, Besler back in the lineup for #SportingKC, making his first appearance since returning from the #USMNT at the FIFA World Cup.

timelineItems.name: Pierre Mailhot
timelineItems.text: OK, c'est quoi l'excuse ce soir? Ils sont cachés où les fans de soccer à Montréal? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Andrea Vaccaro
timelineItems.text: @KrzysztofKrol23 #imfc 1st game http://t.co/OGfZ8ePgXe

timelineItems.name: Andrea Vaccaro
timelineItems.text: @KrzysztofKrol23 #imfc 1st game http://t.co/OGfZ8ePgXe

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Patterson
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC have yet to lose this season when they score first (7-0-4).

timelineItems.comment: Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City).
Offside, Sporting Kansas City. Dominic Dwyer tries a through ball, but Benny Feilhaber is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: A.P.
timelineItems.text: Meilleur marquage dans du U-18. C'est effarant. #impact #imfc

timelineItems.name: Ambiance Brésilienne
timelineItems.text: Ouf! Juste à temps ;) #IMFC http://t.co/SxxOaPPtYE

timelineItems.name: Ambiance Brésilienne
timelineItems.text: Ouf! Juste à temps ;) #IMFC http://t.co/SxxOaPPtYE

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 0 - @SportingKC haven’t conceded a first half goal to Montreal in #MLS since their first meeting. Focused. #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Chad Lockey™
timelineItems.text: The boys are back. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Tiarra
timelineItems.text: CAPTAIN BACK #SKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC away… prepare for insanity. #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Welcome back, captain. #SportingKC http://t.co/Dfd3bGAZqO

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: Welcome back, captain. #SportingKC http://t.co/Dfd3bGAZqO

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Game on ! Bon match ! #IMFC #SKC #RDS #MLS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: MLS Stream of the Week, get some: http://t.co/2PrymRtbt3 #MTLvSKC http://t.co/jZN4ElrEv6

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: MLS Stream of the Week, get some: http://t.co/2PrymRtbt3 #MTLvSKC http://t.co/jZN4ElrEv6

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: I like Eric Kronberg and wish him a speedy recovery. But the Andy Gruenebaum fanboy in me is chuffed to see him play tonight.

timelineItems.name: Alain Pouliot
timelineItems.text: We have our game face on. Do you? @impactmontreal #imfc #imfclive http://t.co/nCWkhH4oDj

timelineItems.name: Alain Pouliot
timelineItems.text: We have our game face on. Do you? @impactmontreal #imfc #imfclive http://t.co/nCWkhH4oDj

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Ferrari avait l'air de dire à Perkins: Quoi? Tu veux que je coure? Vraiment? #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Dommage que la chimie ne semble pas à point entre Di Vaio et McInerney mais c'est pas mal #IMFC #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Matt Terrill
timelineItems.text: I both love and hate that #SKC uses & excels with the long throw. I love us scoring, but I hate the echoes of Stoke City circa Rory Delap.

timelineItems.name: Sarah Rose Gies
timelineItems.text: My child is mildly obsessed with Graham Zusi gzusi. #zusi #skc http://t.co/nlWbkThQmC

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Patterson
timelineItems.text: Fifteen minutes in, and #SKC backup 'keeper Andy Gruenebaum hasn't been tested yet.

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Krzysztof Krol (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Tout va bien, KC est seulement à 75% de possession jusqu'à date. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Bobby
timelineItems.text: Since #Nesta's departure the #IMFC backline has been an ever-changing combination of consistently mediocre players.. #IMFCLive

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: YMG
timelineItems.text: Il joue Felipe? #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Le salut montréalais viendra-t-il de Mapp face à Sinovic ? En tout cas, #SKC réussit peu à #IMFC cette saison.

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Patterson
timelineItems.text: Nineteen minutes gone, and #SportingKC have 77 per cent possession. And it shows.

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).
Match ends, Montreal Impact 1, Sporting Kansas City 2.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Final: Sporting 2, Domtreal 1. Dwyer has 14 on the year.

timelineItems.name: Adam
timelineItems.text: Aaaaand that's a sweep folks. #SportingKC #NoOtherClub

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: FINAL: What. A. Win. Another @Ddwyer14 double secures a 3rd straight road win with 2-1 victory at @impactmontreal! http://t.co/KN5I1E41Nv

timelineItems.name: Sporting Kansas City
timelineItems.text: FINAL: What. A. Win. Another @Ddwyer14 double secures a 3rd straight road win with 2-1 victory at @impactmontreal! http://t.co/KN5I1E41Nv

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: There's just no stopping @Ddwyer14. http://t.co/242wT9DTf1 #MTLvSKC http://t.co/IUwTlJvWuc

timelineItems.text: FT: There's just no stopping @Ddwyer14. http://t.co/242wT9DTf1 #MTLvSKC http://t.co/IUwTlJvWuc

timelineItems.desc: The Montréal Impact return home looking to score their first goal of the season in three tries vs. Sporting Kansas City when the Eastern Conference foes face off Saturday evening at Stade Saputo.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Montreal Impact vs Sporting Kansas City | July 12, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@Ddwyer14 loves scoring against @impactmontreal. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/w8KyH0f39e #MTLvSKC http://t.co/uwMsi9aFi3

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@Ddwyer14 loves scoring against @impactmontreal. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/w8KyH0f39e #MTLvSKC http://t.co/uwMsi9aFi3

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Patrice Bernier.
Attempt blocked. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Graham Zusi with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Romero n'est plus qu'à un fil de botter quelqu'un dans le derrière (littéralement). #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Jody Strauch
timelineItems.text: That guy stepped on Besler's head a bit ago. Isn't that illegal? It is in my book. #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).
Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Giovanni Sardo
timelineItems.text: Am I the only one who is extremely concerned by #IMFC 's poor communication & body language?? Group therapy perhaps? #CantWeAllJustGetAlong

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Besler long throw + Dwyer header, just how they drew it up: http://t.co/fkLewUeVFe #MTLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Ambiance Brésilienne
timelineItems.text: Toujours aussi lent notre ami Graham Zusi. Il faudrait lui dire qu'il n'est plus au Brésil. #USMNT #MTLvSKC #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: In other news: Klopas wearing shiny black sneakers with white welts (A fad at the Impact since Di Vaio's arrival in July 12) #Analysis #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).
Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: Cant even cross into the offensive final third... SMH #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Two people just went by the press box, hand in hand. Like, literally taking a walk during the game.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: À chaque match, le pressing de KC m'impressionne. Tellement intense ! #IMFC #SKC #RDS

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Montreal Impact 1, Sporting Kansas City 1. Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) header from the centre of the box to the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Marco Di Vaio heads the equalizer to the back post

timelineItems.name: Steve M Arsenault
timelineItems.text: J'aime bien ce que je vois de Krol, mais j'ai dit ça aussi de Bernardello à don premier match. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Bobby
timelineItems.text: I have a feeling that #Felipe is playing his final games for the #IMFC .. #Piatti will probably take over that midfield spot in August ..

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Marco Di Vaio scored a header! Oh my!

timelineItems.name: Jody Strauch
timelineItems.text: Aaarrrgghhh! #SKC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: some terrific head tennis between Mapp and Di Vaio - #IMFC had been more into the game last 10 mins. - taking it to #SKC, finally pays off

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: I figure the blue team has a good shot at a result tonight.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Montreal Impact 0, Sporting Kansas City 1. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) header from the center of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Matt Besler.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Dom Dwyer strikes after a Matt Besler long throw

timelineItems.name: Francis D. Casimiro
timelineItems.text: Qui a besoin des qualités aériennes de #OcceanWatch quand tu as #DiVaio #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Felipe Martins goes in late and sees yellow

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Mettez ça dans votre agenda, Di Vaio a marqué de la tête, ça arrive à peu près une fois par année. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: Montreal scores. Cant believe it #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).
Jacob Peterson (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Kelsey Patterson
timelineItems.text: First career goal for Di Vaio against #SportingKC

timelineItems.desc: Igor Juliao (Sporting Kansas City) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Igor Juliao booked for kicking ball away

timelineItems.desc: Nick Firchau and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Saturday evening match between the Montreal Impact and Sporting KC. Watch all the action on Saturday kicking off at 730pm ET on MLS Live in the US and TSN2 & RDS in Canada.
timelineItems.title: Montreal Impact vs. Sporting KC July 12, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).
Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marco Di Vaio with a headed pass.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Aurélien Collin.

timelineItems.name: RDS
timelineItems.text: De belles opportunités du côté de #IMFC!

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: That's a clear foul on Felipe. Penalty every day of the week. Kansas City very fortunate. #IMFC #SKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Cass
timelineItems.text: For how efficiently and fluidly #SKC has moved the ball, Marco Di Vaio has made up for it in being direct and decisive. Deserved. #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: My God if Schallibaum was still coaching. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Samantha Baker
timelineItems.text: I don't know what's going on. We are NOT playing like champions. Not happy. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Jesse Gilmore
timelineItems.text: I don't think anyone, even (Especially) Impact fans, were expecting this much fight from Montreal. So surprised. #MTLvSKC #SKC #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Kristi Colvin 
timelineItems.text: WHERE. IS. ERIC??!!!!!! #sportingkc #skc #rewindrewindrewind #ihategoalposts http://t.co/lZiMwN8x5N

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).
Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Le message de Klopas, tout comme depuis quelques semaines : "Hold the ball". L'Impact trop direct dans ses actions #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.name: JS Bournival
timelineItems.text: Match tough pour St-Troy #imfc

timelineItems.comment: Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.desc: Andres Romero (Montreal Impact) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Andres Romero gets booked for a late challenge

timelineItems.comment: Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Baldi-LOX
timelineItems.text: The inevitable teams become aggressive with us, no fouls. We start to return the favor, foul. /eyeroll #SKC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a set piece situation.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Seth Sinovic blasts a volley just wide

timelineItems.name: Ambiance Brésilienne
timelineItems.text: Romero doit se calmer les nerfs mais son effort défensif est très admirable. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: 3e crampe au cerveau du match pour Romero. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Foot skills for days.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Seth Sinovic (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Tiarra
timelineItems.text: It's ok, Seth. Save your goals for the playoffs. #SKC

timelineItems.name: Amy Worley
timelineItems.text: Igor Juliao has been a Tasmanian Devil tonight. I like it. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Samantha Baker
timelineItems.text: No one likes Canada anyway. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Fortier
timelineItems.text: Pas une bonne soirée pour Perkins ce soir. Sembles avoir oublié son pied à la maison #imfc #imfclive

timelineItems.comment: Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matt Besler (Sporting Kansas City).
First Half ends, Montreal Impact 1, Sporting Kansas City 1.

timelineItems.name: Amanda Kovac
timelineItems.text: If Gruenebaum wasn't paying attention earlier, he definitely is now. #SportingKC #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Amy Worley
timelineItems.text: Got to hand it to the Montreal supporters. They can make some noise. #SportingKC #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: jeremy filosa
timelineItems.text: 1-1 à la mi-temps. #imfc vs #SportingKC @ochocinco is in the house, lui qui s'est déjà essayé avec KC lors d'un camp.

timelineItems.name: RDS
timelineItems.text: #IMFC : @ochocinco est au match ce soir, mais on n'est pas certain pour qui il compte... #RDS http://t.co/QPLj0Skfhr

timelineItems.name: RDS
timelineItems.text: #IMFC : @ochocinco est au match ce soir, mais on n'est pas certain pour qui il compte... #RDS http://t.co/QPLj0Skfhr

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Definite overall pace difference between WC and MLS. Have to wonder if it's like facing a knuckleballer, for players returning from Brazil.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Montreal Impact 1, Sporting Kansas City 1.
Attempt blocked. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Seth Sinovic.
Delay in match Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Loredana Panza
timelineItems.text: #IMFC @impactmontreal #Tousaustade http://t.co/DvOEtw1UG1

timelineItems.text: #IMFC @impactmontreal #Tousaustade http://t.co/DvOEtw1UG1

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Good thing Felipe got that kid of his before tonight. Ouch.

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Red Lyon Tavern
timelineItems.text: Has squirting water directly down your shorts ever helped with pain? Wtf? #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Felipe not even trying to hide where he got hit.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lawrence Olum (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Toni.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: A long throw by Besler against Montreal and SKC are up one nothing through Dwyer. What else is new?

timelineItems.name: joshklingler
timelineItems.text: Quick everybody take Doms picture #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Amy Worley
timelineItems.text: Thank you, Felipe, for what will surely be an entire library of epic GIFs. #MTLvSKC #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Nicolas Calderon
timelineItems.text: Wow Ferrari. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Chad Pfister
timelineItems.text: Can't be too much longer before Zizzo comes in for JP. #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: Probably mean to say that Felipe was the winner of the Ballons d'Ow tonight, but there it is.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Pendant ce temps à Philadelphie, Andrew Wenger marque le 3e but de l'Union. #IMFC

timelineItems.text: @impactmontreal @ochocinco will sub in and score a brace. #imfc #imfclive

timelineItems.text: We...we a have defence? What a tackle #IMFC �

timelineItems.text: Difficile d'exister dans le triangle Olum Collin Besler pour McInerney. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Loredana Panza
timelineItems.text: PERKINS you majestic man!! #imfc @impactmontreal

timelineItems.name: Sam McDowell
timelineItems.text: Realizing I'm stating the obvious, Dovale has to score there. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Jason Weaver
timelineItems.text: Nice save, but also a poor shot. #SKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matteo Ferrari (Montreal Impact).
Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: Si les milieux continuent de laisser autant de temps à #SKC pour exploiter ce couloir gauche, ça finira par céder. #IMfC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Toni (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Nicolas Calderon
timelineItems.text: Ok Perkins, you are forgiven. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Borchardt
timelineItems.text: #SportingKC seems to have a goal coming soon. Lots of pressure from SKC the last 5 minutes...

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: How Peter Vermes is still sitting quietly in that dugout is beyond me.

timelineItems.comment: Igor Julião (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Krzysztof Krol (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Ambiance Brésilienne
timelineItems.text: #DebatSSF L'arrêt de Troy Perkins - tournant du match? - retarder l'échéance? #IMFC #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Marc Tougas
timelineItems.text: Felipe ne devrait plus tomber. Ca ne sert absolument à rien. A cause de sa réputation, il est sur la liste noire à vie des arbitres. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Molly
timelineItems.text: I'm a fan of any grown man named Benny. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Of all people back there winning that last-ditch tackle… it's Benny Feilhaber. #SportingKC #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Brian
timelineItems.text: HOW do you miss that handball?! Just terrible #SportingKC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Fun fact: @impactmontreal is a couter-attacking even even at home. Or call it "quick breaks" #samedifference #IMFC #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Felipe Martins (Montreal Impact).
Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Thayne Griffin
timelineItems.text: Seriouly though, someone explain why JK didn't use Besler's long throw? Gives #SKC at least one solid chance per game. @MLSAnalyst?

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Toni (Sporting Kansas City).
Justin Mapp (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Issey Nakajima-Farran (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Patrice Bernier.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: L'entraîneur adjoint Nico Kounenakis a tendu la main à Romero. Il l'a ignoré et est allé s'asseoir #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.comment: Benny Feilhaber (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).
Attempt missed. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Justin Mapp.
Attempt saved. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Heath Pearce (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Graham Zusi (Sporting Kansas City).

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: Smart move by Klopas to bring in Larrea to take away space for #SKC midfield. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Nicolas Gauthier
timelineItems.text: Stressants ces adversaires du @SportingKC on voit pourquoi ils obtiennent de bons résultats années après années. Go Impact Go #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: Sapong et Saad vont entrer #SKC #MLS #RDS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gorka Larrea (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Now that Bieler is into the abyss, no idea why Sapong's not been playing more of late. #SportingKC #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City).
Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Olivier Brett
timelineItems.text: #SKC y va "All in" avec Sapong et saad qui entrent avec 15 mins à jouer. Vermes pas un fan des matchs nuls. #IMFClive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Aurélien Collin.

timelineItems.name: Ambiance Brésilienne
timelineItems.text: Même inactif il est vraiment dangereux ce Jack Mac. Une sorte de Di Vaio 2013 quoi. #IMFC #MLTvSKC

timelineItems.name: Patrick Friolet
timelineItems.text: 5e but en 3 matchs vs l'Impact pour Dwyer #SKC #IMFC #RDS

timelineItems.name: Steve Brisendine
timelineItems.text: One more goal, and the city will be renamed "Domtreal."

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Patrice Bernier (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Daniel
timelineItems.text: Too many wasted chances #skc

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Hassoun Camara goes just a bit too high

timelineItems.name: paul delude
timelineItems.text: ROFL ENCORE MALLACE . on veux vraiment un match nul. #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Krzysztof Krol (Montreal Impact).
C.J. Sapong (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Amy Worley
timelineItems.text: No matter how loud it gets, you can still hear PV scream. #sportingkc

timelineItems.name: Sam McDowell
timelineItems.text: It wouldn't be a #SportingKC game without a Dom Dwyer bicycle attempt.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Hassoun Camara (Montreal Impact) left footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses the top left corner.

Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Nicolas Gauthier
timelineItems.text: Quelques minutes supplémentaires pour obtenir 3 points #IMFC L'équipe a besoin de victoires en match de saison régulière.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Sporting Kansas City. Conceded by Hassoun Camara.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Montreal Impact 1, Sporting Kansas City 2. Dominic Dwyer (Sporting Kansas City) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Dom Dwyer takes advantage after a Montreal blunder

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Aurélien Collin (Sporting Kansas City) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Graham Zusi with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Sérieusement, t'as besoin de points e tut mets des milieux défensifs? À domicile en plus? J'abandonne. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Nick Sabetti
timelineItems.text: Kansas City recover possession after high press, technical staff clap in the booth behind me. #SKC #MLS #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Chris Hurst
timelineItems.text: I failed. I forgot to DVR the #SportingKC game so I could watch it after date night.

timelineItems.name: Bèbé.YNWA
timelineItems.text: You'd be hard pressed to find more shambolic defending than what brazil have shown in the last week....then you watch #IMFC play,stupid goal

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Guess what. Dom Dwyer just scored.

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: I don't exactly know what just happened. #SportingKC #MTLvSKC

timelineItems.name: Douglas Gelevan
timelineItems.text: Classic #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Thad
timelineItems.text: Dom LOVES Montreal! #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: NatashaOjedaBanditto
timelineItems.text: IS THIS A DAMN JOKE THOUGH?! HONESTLY! #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Bandon Decker
timelineItems.text: I think it would be fair to call that a howler by the Montreal defence though! Goes down as yet another goal for Dom though. #SKC

timelineItems.name: David Stanley
timelineItems.text: Thank goodness Dwyer scored. A draw would have been like a loss playing Montreal. #SportingKC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Laine Saunders
timelineItems.text: That was one of the dumbest plays I've ever seen in a soccer game. #SKC 2-1

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marco Di Vaio (Montreal Impact).
Andy Gruenebaum (Sporting Kansas City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Schneider
timelineItems.text: That's what high pressure do. #SportingKC

timelineItems.name: Ambiance Brésilienne
timelineItems.text: Ce sera peut-être le temps de parler de la gestion de match de notre ami Franck. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Joly Alexandre
timelineItems.text: @Olivier_Brett klopas gére pour protéger. Mais on protège quoi quand #imfc est dernier
